answer: 🕷️ I really don't like spiders or any kind of creepy bugs. They always sneak up and give me the shivers!
🎮 I hate losing in obby games on Roblox - especially when I fall right at the end after trying so hard!
😴 Bad dreams are the worst. I always wake up wishing I could jump back into a happy dream full of unicorns and candy.
🍦 I hate dropping my ice cream before I even get one bite... it’s like the saddest thing ever!
🚿 Honestly... I don’t like taking showers when I’m cozy or busy playing. It's like being dragged away from fun!
